attributes.additional_details: Fireworks are not always used responsibly, and the times of the year where they are sold results in a huge increase of calls to the emergency services. Fireworks are also traumatising for a lot of people, Veterans, Elderly, Babies, Animals, Children, those with a Disability or Mental Health condition. Thousands of people are killed or seriously injured each year by the misuse or an accident of a firework.
attributes.background: We would like for the Government and Parliament to ban the use of fireworks by the public and be kept to licensed professionals only.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868
